name: loop
snippet:
<fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList">
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$items</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[ValueCount ( $items )]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$itemCount</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[""]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$i</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="71" name="Loop"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="72" name="Exit Loop If">
		<Calculation><![CDATA[Let ( $i = $i + 1 ; If ( $i > Int ( $itemCount ) ; Let ( $i = "" ; True ) ) )]]></Calculation>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[GetValue ( $items ; $i )]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$item</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="73" name="End Loop"></Step>
</fmxmlsnippet>
